title: Necessary Dating Education
overview: Necessary Dating Education tells the story of 6 freshmen at the university who are taking "necessary dating education". Three boys and three girls that have to date by changing partner from time to time. There are different types of people: a university student that likes fluttering but not dating, a guy who has no dating experience and is clueless about dating, a couple that is going through a period of lassitude as they arrive in college.
